      • getConstructorByArgs

        public static <T> java.lang.reflect.Constructor<T> getConstructorByArgs(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                        java.lang.Object... args)
                                                                 throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Gets the constructor for class T matching the specified arguments
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class
        Parameters:
        clazz - T.class
        args - The arguments that should be passed to the constructor. arguments [ "hello", 12 ] would match constructor(String s, int i)
        Returns:
        The found constructor
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - No such constructor found

      • invokeConstructorWithArgs

        public static <T> T invokeConstructorWithArgs(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                              java.lang.Object... args)
                                       throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                              java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                              java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                              java.lang.InstantiationException
        Attempts to find and invoke the constructor of class T matching the specified arguments
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class
        Parameters:
        clazz - T.class
        args - The arguments to invoke the constructor with. arguments [ "hello", 12 ] would match constructor(String s, int i)
        Returns:
        The constructed Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - No such constructor found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - This constructor is private
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - An exception occurred while invoking this constructor
        java.lang.InstantiationException - This class cannot be constructed (is abstract, interface, etc)
